Texts.Chs: 我找到了一个被腐化的精英爪赫无人机离子炮的核心。武器本身已经损坏到无法修复，但是也许这个核心仍然可以重新利用。^green;我应该去拜访一下远星庇护所里的武器匠^white;——如果有个人能用这个制造武器，那那个人就是阿尤连了。
Texts.Eng: I found the core of a Violated Elite Drahl's ion cannon. The weapon itself is damaged beyond repair, but perhaps this core can still be repurposed. ^green;I should visit the weaponsmith in the Starfarer's Refuge ^white;- if anyone can build a weapon with this, it is Ayurin.

Texts.Chs: 我以前从来没有见过这样的东西，上尉！我可以尝试用它来制造武器，但这将是一个挑战。
Texts.Eng: I have never seen anything like this before, Captain! I can try to build a weapon from it, but it will be a challenge.
